exmls.content:
<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="PauseBtnSkin"
        states="up,down,upAndSelected,downAndSelected"
        xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image source="pause_btn_1_png" source.upAndSelected="pause_btn_2_png" source.downAndSelected="pause_btn_2_png"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="SBtnSkin4_1" states="up,down"
        xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image id="iconDisplay" source="s_41_1_png" source.up="s_41_1_png" source.down="s_41_2_png"/>
	<e:BitmapLabel id="labelDisplay" font="s_num_big_fnt" text="0" verticalCenter="0" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="SBtnSkin4_2" states="up,down"
        xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image id="iconDisplay" source="s_42_1_png" source.down="s_42_2_png" source.up="s_42_1_png"/>
	<e:BitmapLabel id="labelDisplay" font="s_num_big_fnt" text="0" verticalCenter="0" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="SBtnSkin9_1" states="up,down"
        xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image id="iconDisplay" source="s_91_1_png" source.up="s_91_1_png" source.down="s_91_2_png"/>
	<e:BitmapLabel id="labelDisplay" font="s_num_big_fnt" text="0" verticalCenter="0" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="SBtnSkin9_2" states="up,down"
        xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image id="iconDisplay" source="s_92_1_png" source.up="s_92_1_png" source.down="s_92_2_png"/>
	<e:BitmapLabel id="labelDisplay" font="s_num_big_fnt" text="0" verticalCenter="0" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="SBtnSkin_1" states="up,down"
        xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" width="284" height="154">
	<e:Image id="iconDisplay" source="s_1_1_png" source.up="s_1_1_png" source.down="s_1_2_png"/>
	<e:BitmapLabel id="labelDisplay" font="s_num_big_fnt" text="0" verticalCenter="0" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="SBtnSkin_2" states="up,down"
        xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" width="284" height="154">
	<e:Image id="iconDisplay" source="s_2_1_png" source.up="s_2_1_png" source.down="s_2_2_png"/>
	<e:BitmapLabel id="labelDisplay" font="s_num_big_fnt" text="0" verticalCenter="0" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="SoundBtnSkin"
        states="up,down,upAndSelected,downAndSelected"
        xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" width="82" height="82">
	<e:Image source.down="sound_btn_on_png" source.up="sound_btn_on_png" source.upAndSelected="sound_btn_off_png" source.downAndSelected="sound_btn_off_png"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="AboutSceneSkin" width="640" height="1024" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="about_bg_jpg"/>
	<e:Button id="okBtn" y="894" x="206" width="228" height="87">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="ok_btn_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="GameSceneSkin" width="640" height="1024" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" >
	<e:Image id="bg" source="game_bg_1_jpg"/>
	<e:ToggleButton y="890" x="520" label="声音" id="soundBtn" skinName="SoundBtnSkin"/>
	<e:BitmapLabel id="timeLB" font="score_and_time_fnt" text="03:00" y="250" x="232"/>
	<e:Group id="group" height="500" width="500" y="311" horizontalCenter="0">
		<e:layout>
			<e:BasicLayout/>
		</e:layout>
	</e:Group>
	<e:ToggleButton id="pauseBtn" x="40" y="890" skinName="PauseBtnSkin"/>
	<e:BitmapLabel id="scoreLB" y="899" font="score_and_time_fnt" text="积分:0" horizontalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image id="modeTip" y="17" source="compare_text_1_png" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="CompareLayerSkin" width="500" height="500" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" states="s1,s2" >
	<e:Button id="btn1" label="1" skinName="SBtnSkin_1" skinName.s2="SBtnSkin_2" x="108" height="154" y="15"/>
	<e:Button id="btn2" label="2" skinName="SBtnSkin_1" skinName.s2="SBtnSkin_2" x="108" y="341"/>
	<e:Image source="compare_circle_png" x="168" y="168"/>
	<e:BitmapLabel id="middleNumLB" font="compare_circle_num_fnt" text="0" x="228" y="230"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="EliminatelayerSkin" width="500" height="500" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" states="m1s1,m2s1,m3s1,m1s2,m2s2,m3s2"  width.m1s1="500" height.m1s1="500" width.m1s2="500" height.m1s2="500">
	<e:Button id="m3btn1" y="15" label="1" x="15" includeIn="m3s1,m3s2" skinName="SBtnSkin9_1" skinName.m3s2="SBtnSkin9_2"/>
	<e:Button id="m3btn2" y="15" label="2" includeIn="m3s1,m3s2" x.m2s2="220" x.m1s2="220" x.m2s1="220" x.m1s1="220" skinName="SBtnSkin9_1" x.m3s1="179" y.m3s1="15" x.m3s2="179" y.m3s2="15" skinName.m3s2="SBtnSkin9_2"/>
	<e:Button id="m3btn3" y="15" label="3" includeIn="m3s1,m3s2" x.m2s2="425" x.m1s2="425" x.m2s1="425" x.m1s1="425" skinName="SBtnSkin9_1" x.m3s1="342" y.m3s1="15" x.m3s2="342" y.m3s2="15" skinName.m3s2="SBtnSkin9_2"/>
	<e:Button id="m3btn4" y="220" x="15" label="4" includeIn="m3s1,m3s2" skinName="SBtnSkin9_1" y.m3s1="179" y.m3s2="179" skinName.m3s2="SBtnSkin9_2"/>
	<e:Button id="m3btn5" label="5" includeIn="m3s1,m3s2" x="220" y="220" skinName="SBtnSkin9_1" x.m3s1="179" y.m3s1="179" x.m3s2="179" y.m3s2="179" skinName.m3s2="SBtnSkin9_2"/>
	<e:Button id="m3btn6" y="220" label="6" x="425" includeIn="m3s1,m3s2" skinName="SBtnSkin9_1" x.m3s1="342" y.m3s1="179" x.m3s2="342" y.m3s2="179" skinName.m3s2="SBtnSkin9_2"/>
	<e:Button id="m3btn7" label="7" includeIn="m3s1,m3s2" x="15" y="425" skinName="SBtnSkin9_1" y.m3s1="343" y.m3s2="343" skinName.m3s2="SBtnSkin9_2"/>
	<e:Button id="m3btn8" y="425" label="8" x="220" includeIn="m3s1,m3s2" skinName="SBtnSkin9_1" x.m3s1="179" y.m3s1="343" x.m3s2="179" y.m3s2="343" skinName.m3s2="SBtnSkin9_2"/>
	<e:Button id="m3btn9" y="425" x="425" label="9" includeIn="m3s1,m3s2" skinName="SBtnSkin9_1" x.m3s1="342" y.m3s1="343" x.m3s2="342" y.m3s2="343" skinName.m3s2="SBtnSkin9_2"/>
	<e:Button id="m2btn1" y.m2s2="65" y.m1s2="90" y.m3s1="90" y.m1s1="90" x.m1s2="90" x.m3s1="90" x.m1s1="90" label="1" includeIn="m2s1,m2s2" skinName="SBtnSkin4_1" skinName.m2s2="SBtnSkin4_2" y.m2s1="65" y.m3s2="90" x.m3s2="90" x.m2s2="25" x.m2s1="25"/>
	<e:Button id="m2btn2" y="90" label="2" x.m1s2="310" x.m3s1="310" x.m1s1="310" includeIn="m2s1,m2s2" skinName="SBtnSkin4_1" skinName.m2s2="SBtnSkin4_2" y.m2s1="65" y.m2s2="65" x.m3s2="310" x.m2s2="264" x.m2s1="264"/>
	<e:Button id="m2btn3" y="310" x.m3s2="90" x.m1s2="90" x.m3s1="90" x.m1s1="90" label="3" includeIn="m2s1,m2s2" skinName="SBtnSkin4_1" skinName.m2s2="SBtnSkin4_2" y.m2s1="290" y.m2s2="290" x.m2s2="25" x.m2s1="25"/>
	<e:Button id="m2btn4" y="310" label="4" x.m3s2="310" x.m1s2="310" x.m3s1="310" x.m1s1="310" includeIn="m2s1,m2s2" skinName="SBtnSkin4_1" skinName.m2s2="SBtnSkin4_2" y.m2s1="290" y.m2s2="290" x.m2s2="264" x.m2s1="264"/>
	<e:Button id="m1btn1" label="1" includeIn="m1s1,m1s2" skinName="SBtnSkin_1" y.m3s2="80" y.m2s2="80" y.m3s1="80" y.m2s1="80" x="148" skinName.m1s2="SBtnSkin_2" x.m1s1="108" x.m1s2="108" y.m1s1="25" y.m1s2="25"/>
	<e:Button id="m1btn2" label="2" includeIn="m1s1,m1s2" skinName="SBtnSkin_1" y.m3s2="346" y.m2s2="346" y.m3s1="346" y.m2s1="346" x="148" skinName.m1s2="SBtnSkin_2" x.m1s1="108" x.m1s2="108" y.m1s1="331" y.m1s2="331"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="SearchLayerSkin" width="500" height="500" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" states="s1,s2" >
	<e:Button id="btn1" label="1" skinName="SBtnSkin_1" skinName.s2="SBtnSkin_2" x="108" y="15"/>
	<e:Button id="btn2" label="2" skinName="SBtnSkin_1" skinName.s2="SBtnSkin_2" x="108" y="331"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="LoaderSceneSkin" width="640" height="1024" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Rect height="1024" width="640" x="0" y="0" fillColor="0x202020"/>
	<e:Image source="loader_png" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Label id="loadTextLB" size="30" fontFamily="微软雅黑" width="640" textAlign="center" x="0" y="870" textColor="0x53D8D8"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="MainSceneSkin" width="640" height="1024" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="main_bg_jpg"/>
	<e:ToggleButton id="soundBtn" x="537" y="17" skinName="SoundBtnSkin"/>
	<e:Button id="compareBtn" y="615" x="205">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="compare_btn_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Button id="searchBtn" y="665" x="205">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="search_btn_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Button id="eliminateBtn" y="715" x="205">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="eliminate_btn_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Button id="aboutBtn" y="765" x="205">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="about_btn_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Label id="versionLB" text="版本：0.1" size="24" fontFamily="微软雅黑" y="986" x="12" textColor="0x000000"/>
	<e:Label id="scoreLB" text="历史最高分：0" y="253" size="30" textColor="0x4F1212" fontFamily="微软雅黑" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="OverSceneSkin" width="640" height="1024" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="over_bg_jpg"/>
	<e:Button y="890" id="backBtn" x="206" width="228" height="87">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="restart_btn_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:BitmapLabel id="scoreLB" x="236" y="805" font="score_and_time_fnt" text="积分:0"/>
	<e:Image source="over_text_png" y="49" x="80"/>
	<e:Image source="zhu_tou_png" x="12" y="254"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="PauseWinSkin" width="640" height="1024" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Rect height="880" width="640" x="0" y="0" fillColor="0xFFFFFF" fillAlpha="0"/>
	<e:Button id="backBtn" horizontalCenter="0" y="895">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="restart_btn_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Button id="closeBtn" y="810" horizontalCenter="0">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="back_btn_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Image source="pause_text_png" y="250" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>
